verbs.description: [ARG1: irish border dispute] [V: looms] [ARG2: large] [ARGM-LOC: over the uk - eu brexit talks shifts that came only two days ahead of a summit once seen as the last moment to reach a deal on britain divorce from the bloc after a flurry of weekend meetings had raised expectations for a brexit agreement only to dash them again eu and british leaders sought to keep alive the possibility that wednesday summit could see a brexit breakthrough despite their conflicting stances u k lawless sammy wilson chevening house democratic unionist party jeremy hunt miroslav lajcak geir moulson foreign affairs council britain london eu angela merkel england heiko maas frantisek ruzickas lorne cook brexit irish island sevenoaks scotland conservative party luxembourg prime minister leo varadkar united kingdom eu council josep borrell theresa may ireland northern ireland wales jill lawless gibraltar parliament donald tusk eastern european foreign ministers chancellor irish sea prime minister penny mordaunt berlin germany cook president brussels european union spain official republic of ireland house of commons uk simon coveney council of the european union secretary prime minister theresa may] james slack
